title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Westbrook-Lillard, Clippers
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Westbrook-Lillard, Clippers
description:
Colin explains why Damian Lillard is better than Russell Westbrook, and the Clippers not caring about the regular season.


Guest: Nick Wright
